name: Station
description: A facility for boarding and disembarking from transportation provides a hub for travel and commerce. The constant flow of travelers creates opportunities for trade and information exchange, while the strategic location makes it vulnerable to attack.
atmosphere: Steam whistles echo through the station while traveler conversations blend with platform announcements in a symphony of constant movement. The air carries the scent of coal smoke, leather luggage, and the promise of distant destinations. Every surface bustles with travel energy. Your skin feels the wooden platform and the sense of constant movement. The taste of travel and information exchange fills your mouth.
